markdownRemark.excerpt: hosting only choice one（netlify, vercel, ...) netlify cms 可以通过 gastby 插件进行支持（还没试) Gastby have many templates Gastby project struct is clearly Gastby…
markdownRemark.html:
• hosting only choice one（netlify, vercel, ...)
  • netlify cms 可以通过 gastby 插件进行支持（还没试)
  • Gastby have many templates
  • Gastby project struct is clearly
  • Gastby 自己也有托管服务
  • data source 配合 Graphql 十分容易定制
  • 3000 plus plugins
  • markdown is default , also support mdx(migration is trouble，I tried many times 😢)
  • SSG render is very fast
  • 可以同时使用多套主题，blog, notes, 两个路由使用两个主题
  • support tailwindcss easily
  • dont use md and mdx mixed (at present not familiar)
